verses.verse: Now these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the tribes. <S%H7626><s%> From the north <S%H6828><s%> end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the coast <S%H3027><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%> of Hethlon, <S%H2855><s%> as one goeth <S%H935><s%> to Hamath, <S%H2574><s%> Hazar-enan, <S%H2704><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the coast <S%H3027><s%> of Hamath; <S%H2574><s%> for these are <S%H1961><s%> his sides <S%H6285><s%> east <S%H6921><s%> and west; <S%H3220><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion for Dan. <S%H1835><s%>

And by <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion for Asher. <S%H836><s%>

And by <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion for Naphtali. <S%H5321><s%>

And by <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion for Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

And by <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion for Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

And by <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion for Reuben. <S%H7205><s%>

And by <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion for Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

And by <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> the offering <S%H8641><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> of five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> reeds in breadth, <S%H7341><s%> and in length <S%H753><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> of the other parts, <S%H2506><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side: <S%H6285><s%> and the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of it.

The oblation <S%H8641><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be of five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in length, <S%H753><s%> and of ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in breadth. <S%H7341><s%>

And for them, <S%H428><s%> even for the priests, <S%H3548><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> this holy <S%H6944><s%> oblation; <S%H8641><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in length, and toward the west <S%H3220><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in breadth, <S%H7341><s%> and toward the east <S%H6921><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in breadth, <S%H7341><s%> and toward the south <S%H5045><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in length: <S%H753><s%> and the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

It shall be for the priests <S%H3548><s%> that are sanctified <S%H6942><s%> of the sons <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok; <S%H6659><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have kept <S%H8104><s%> my charge, <S%H4931><s%> which <S%H834><s%> went not astray <S%H8582><s%> <S%H3808><s%> when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went astray, <S%H8582><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> went astray. <S%H8582><s%>

And this oblation <S%H8642><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> that is offered <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8641><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> unto them a thing most holy <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%> by <S%H413><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Levites. <S%H3881><s%>

And over against <S%H5980><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall have five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in length, <S%H753><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in breadth: <S%H7341><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> shall be five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand, <S%H505><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

And they shall not <S%H3808><s%> sell <S%H4376><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> it, neither <S%H3808><s%> exchange, <S%H4171><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> alienate <S%H5674><s%> the firstfruits <S%H7225><s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it is holy <S%H6944><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the five <S%H2568><s%> thousand, <S%H505><s%> that are left <S%H3498><s%> in the breadth <S%H7341><s%> over against <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand, <S%H505><s%> shall be a profane <S%H2455><s%> place for the city, <S%H5892><s%> for dwelling, <S%H4186><s%> and for suburbs: <S%H4054><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

And these <S%H428><s%> shall be the measures <S%H4060><s%> thereof; the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> and the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> and on the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> and the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

And the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty, <S%H2572><s%> and toward the south <S%H5045><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty, <S%H2572><s%> and toward the east <S%H6921><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty, <S%H2572><s%> and toward the west <S%H3220><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty. <S%H2572><s%>

And the residue <S%H3498><s%> in length <S%H753><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> the oblation <S%H8641><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> portion shall be ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> eastward, <S%H6921><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> westward: <S%H3220><s%> and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> the oblation <S%H8641><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> portion; and the increase <S%H8393><s%> thereof shall be <S%H1961><s%> for food <S%H3899><s%> unto them that serve <S%H5647><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>
And they that serve <S%H5647><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> it out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the oblation <S%H8641><s%> shall be five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> by five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand: <S%H505><s%> ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> <S%H853><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> oblation <S%H8641><s%> foursquare, <S%H7243><s%> with <S%H413><s%> the possession <S%H272><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And the residue <S%H3498><s%> shall be for the prince, <S%H5387><s%> on the one side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> and on the other <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> oblation, <S%H8641><s%> and of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> over against <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> of the oblation <S%H8641><s%> toward <S%H5704><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%> border, <S%H1366><s%> and westward <S%H3220><s%> over against <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> border, <S%H1366><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> the portions <S%H2506><s%> for the prince: <S%H5387><s%> and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> oblation; <S%H8641><s%> and the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

Moreover from the possession <S%H4480><s%> <S%H272><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and from the possession <S%H4480><s%> <S%H272><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> being in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of that which <S%H834><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> the prince's, <S%H5387><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> for the prince. <S%H5387><s%>

As for the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the tribes, <S%H7626><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> shall have a <S%H259><s%> portion.

And by <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Simeon <S%H8095><s%> shall have a <S%H259><s%> portion.

And by <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Issachar <S%H3485><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion.

And by <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion.

And by <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Gad <S%H1410><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion.

And by <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward, <S%H8486><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> even from Tamar <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8559><s%> unto the waters <S%H4325><s%> of strife <S%H4808><s%> in Kadesh, <S%H6946><s%> and to the river <S%H5158><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall divide by lot <S%H5307><s%> unto the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for inheritance, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5159><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> are their portions, <S%H4256><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the goings out <S%H8444><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> measures. <S%H4060><s%>

And the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be after <S%H5921><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> gates <S%H8179><s%> northward; <S%H6828><s%> one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Levi. <S%H3878><s%>

And at <S%H413><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred: <S%H3967><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> gates; <S%H8179><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Dan. <S%H1835><s%>

And at the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> measures: <S%H4060><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> gates; <S%H8179><s%> one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Zebulun. <S%H2074><s%>

At the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> with their three <S%H7969><s%> gates; <S%H8179><s%> one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Naphtali. <S%H5321><s%>

It was round about <S%H5439><s%> eighteen <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> measures: and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> from that day <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> shall be, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is there. <S%H8033><s%>
